meanings.definition: Any day of the week except Saturday or Sunday.
meanings.sent1: On a weekday, I have school and homework to do.
meanings.sent2: I usually go grocery shopping on a weekday after work.
meanings.sent3: Forgetting it was a weekday, he showed up to work in his pajamas.
meanings.sent4: The weekday stretched ahead like a long road with no end in sight.
meanings.sent5: The weekday buzzed with activity as people rushed to their jobs.

meanings.definition: A day of the week other than Saturday or Sunday.
meanings.sent1: She always schedules her appointments for a weekday.
meanings.sent2: Let's plan to meet for lunch on a weekday next week.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to know when it was a weekday and demanded attention.
meanings.sent4: The weekday felt like a hidden gem, quiet and peaceful.
meanings.sent5: The weekday sun shone brightly, warming the streets with its rays.
